people_also_ask.question: What is the difference between Devil May Cry 3 and Devil May Cry 3 Special Edition?
people_also_ask.heading: Devil May Cry 3: Special Edition is a re-release of Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening with an impressive list of added content: It is now possible to play as Vergil on a separate save file. ... He plays through the same levels as Dante but without the voiced cutscenes and behaves like him during scripted scenes.
people_also_ask.title: Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening

people_also_ask.question: Is Devil May Cry 3 hard?
people_also_ask.heading: Devil May Cry 3 is said to be the most difficult game in the series, and the original release is often regarded as one of the most difficult games of all time. Enemies and Bosses generally get tougher while the player gets weaker as the difficulty increases.
people_also_ask.title: Difficulty Mode | Devil May Cry Wiki
